function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Delayed reaction to pandemic threat","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Downplaying the threat of covid-19","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Neglect of certain sustainable development goals sdgs due to focus on covid-19","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Impact of covid-19 on global economy","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Famine due to covid-19 pandemic","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Effect of pandemics on vulnerable populations","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential presence of sars-cov-2 in the built environment","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Possibility of sars-cov-2 rna fragments in sewage","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Silent reintroduction and transmission of wild poliovirus type 1 in sewage","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Applicability of wbe to sars-cov-2 for prompt detection","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential spread of sars-cov-2 through sewage contamination and wastewater","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Relying on molecular methods for quantifying virus concentration in raw sewage","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Comparison of wastewater surveillance data with clinical data","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Low incidence of reported human infections","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"High number of active cases contributing to virus circulation","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Detection of viral rna in urban wastewaters","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Detection of sars-cov-2 rna in influent samples from multiple wastewater treatment plants.","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Virus concentration below the limit of detection of the assay","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate thermal treatment for virus inactivation","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Retesting for confirmation of results","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Inaccurate identification of sars-cov-2 genome sequences","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Low sensitivity of real-time rt-qpcr assay","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Handling of pcr reagents and samples in a laboratory setting poses a risk of contamination and spread of infectious diseases.","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of nested pcr with multiple cycles can increase the risk of contamination and false positives.","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unamplified synthetic dna used to set up pcr conditions may introduce contamination during subsequent experiments.","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Improper handling of sample rna during cdna synthesis can lead to contamination and inaccurate results.","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Handling enveloped viruses without proper chloroform treatment","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Prolonged lysis phase during rna extraction","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of nested rt-pcr assays without standardization for sars-cov-2 detection","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Raw sewage samples collected from multiple wwtps in densely populated areas.","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential contamination of sewage with viral rna from covid-19 patients","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of insight into the presence of sars-cov-2 in wastewater in italy","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Excretion of fecal-oral viruses at high concentration in sewage","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Presence of presymptomatic and paucisymptomatic carriers contributing to disease spread","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of efficient control of virus transmission in wastewater","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Wastewater-based epidemiology as a recognized public health surveillance tool","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of disaster risk management education at all levels","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Insufficient investments in research and development","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Ghg emissions exacerbating
